content: Generate a jingle for a fictional detergent brand

Sure! Here's a catchy jingle for a fictional detergent brand called "SparkleWave":

(Verse 1)  
When your clothes need a little shine,  
And stains have settled in a line,  
Reach for SparkleWave, it's time,  
To make your laundry feel divine!

(Chorus)  
SparkleWave, sparkle bright,  
Colors popping, pure delight!  
For every wash, day or night,  
SparkleWave, it’s clean done right!

(Verse 2)  
From muddy boots to messy spills,  
SparkleWave conquers laundry thrills.  
Freshness sailing through the hills,  
Feel the magic, feel the chills!

(Chorus)  
SparkleWave, sparkle bright,  
Colors popping, pure delight!  
For every wash, day or night,  
SparkleWave, it’s clean done right!

(Outro)  
SparkleWave, where clothes revive,  
Bringing your wardrobe back to life!  
SparkleWave, the perfect drive,  
For laundry that loves to thrive!  

Catch the wave with SparkleWave!
